last_episode_to_air.name: I'm in Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rebecca makes a life-changing decision about her future.

name: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend
overview: Rebecca Bunch is a successful, driven, and possibly crazy young woman who impulsively gives up everything - her partnership at a prestigious law firm and her upscale apartment in Manhattan - in a desperate attempt to find love and happiness in that exotic hotbed of romance and adventure: suburban West Covina, California.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Neurotic lawyer Rebecca bumps into her high school boyfriend on the street and pursues him across the country on a misguided quest for true love.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, Rebecca embraces her newfound openness with Josh, but her honesty sends Paula and the whole gang in unexpected directions.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Rebecca regroups after her latest relationship drama, Josh finds a new calling, Paula and Scott work on their marriage, and Darryl gets baby fever.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Following a string of very questionable decisions, Rebecca vows to take responsibility for her actions -- but goes a little overboard.

episodes.name: Josh Just Happens to Live Here!
episodes.overview: Rebecca Bunch is a successful, driven, and possibly crazy young woman who impulsively gives up everything – her partnership at a prestigious law firm and her upscale apartment in Manhattan – in a desperate attempt to find love and happiness in that exotic hotbed of romance and adventure: suburban West Covina, Calif. (it’s only two hours from the beach! Four in traffic).

episodes.name: Josh’s Girlfriend is Really Cool!
episodes.overview: When Rebecca learns that Josh has a gorgeous yoga instructor girlfriend named Valencia, she is determined to learn everything about her. Rebecca attempts (unsuccessfully) to learn yoga, tries (unsuccessfully) to get into the local nightclub Josh and Valencia go to, and finds herself becoming a little too obsessed with Valencia.

episodes.name: I Hope Josh Comes to My Party!
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get closer to Josh, Rebecca throws a housewarming party despite her lack of social connections in West Covina and a childhood fear of hosting parties. When Paula finally convinces her, the party turns out to be nothing like they anticipated.

guest_stars.character: Boy with the Port Wine Stain
guest_stars.name: Norton Leufven

episodes.name: I'm Going on a Date With Josh's Friend!
episodes.overview: When Rebecca learns that Josh  and Valencia seem as happy as ever, she goes into a spiral and vows to make healthier choices. As a result, when nice guy Greg asks her out on a date, she wonders if that is the path towards a happier life.

episodes.name: Josh and I Are Good People!
episodes.overview: After Rebecca and Greg’s disastrous date, Greg accuses her of being a terrible person in front of Josh. Rebecca takes drastic measures to prove she is a good person, which includes helping Darryl with his messy divorce. Meanwhile, Paula takes over the office as the boss for the day.

episodes.name: My First Thanksgiving with Josh!
episodes.overview: Rebecca scores an invite to the Chan family Thanksgiving festivities, where Josh’s parents fall in love with her much to Valencia’s dismay. Meanwhile, Greg struggles with taking care of his dad and wanting to pursue his dreams.

episodes.name: I'm So Happy That Josh Is So Happy!
episodes.overview: Rebecca has a tough week after learning some news about Josh and someone surprising shows up to help her - Dr. Phil. Paula is pursued by an important new client Calvin and not just professionally.

episodes.name: My Mom, Greg’s Mom and Josh’s Sweet Dance Moves!
episodes.overview: It is the holidays and Rebecca’s mom decides to come visit her in West Covina. Old habits die hard and Rebecca, eager to please her mom, embellishes some facts about her life, which all comes crashing down at a local holiday event. Meanwhile, Greg spends Christmas Eve with his mother and discovers he actually might be the problem relative.

episodes.name: I'm Going to the Beach With Josh and His Friends!
episodes.overview: Rebecca rents a party bus to take Josh's friend group to the beach in order to impress them. On the trip, she learns more about her new friends than she expected and makes a surprising revelation herself.

episodes.name: I'm Back at Camp With Josh!
episodes.overview: After Rebecca finds out about Josh volunteering at a camp for at-risk youth, she decides to use the situation to remind him about their time together at camp.

episodes.name: That Text Was Not Meant for Josh!
episodes.overview: Rebecca mistakenly sends Josh a text meant for Paula and takes drastic measures to ensure he never sees it. Meanwhile, Paula and her husband attempt to rekindle their relationship, only to be thwarted by Rebecca.

episodes.name: Josh and I Work on a Case!
episodes.overview: After the texting debacle, Rebecca attempts to recover by pursuing a case she thinks will bring her closer to Josh. Darryl tries to reconcile his feelings for White Josh, while Greg is obsessed with trying to uncover Rebecca’s real motives for taking on the case.

episodes.name: Josh and I Go to Los Angeles!
episodes.overview: Rebecca and Josh head to Los Angeles to present their case, which also forces them to confront their long buried feelings. Greg grapples with his feelings for Rebecca, while Darryl and White Josh continue to explore their newfound feelings for one another.

episodes.name: Josh Is Going to Hawaii!
episodes.overview: Rebecca learns that Josh has conflicted feelings for her and Darryl wants to let everyone know about his newfound bisexuality. Meanwhile, Greg must figure out how to work alongside Heather post break-up.

episodes.name: Josh Has No Idea Where I Am!
episodes.overview: Rebecca gets stuck on a plane with her therapist, who takes her on a surprising journey. Meanwhile, in West Covina, Josh, Paula, Darryl and even a reluctant Greg come together to find Rebecca.

episodes.name: Josh's Sister is Getting Married!
episodes.overview: Rebecca is determined to get her life on track so when Josh's sister asks her to be a bridesmaid, Rebecca decides to use her role to make things right with Valencia. Paula cannot accept Rebecca's new mindset while Greg, when helping someone else with their love dilemma, makes a realization of his own.

episodes.name: Why Is Josh in a Bad Mood?
episodes.overview: Rebecca is hiding a big secret from Paula, which begins to affect their friendship. Josh and Greg switch roles when Josh makes a discovery that angers him, while Greg is happier than he has been in a long time.

episodes.name: Paula Needs to Get Over Josh!
episodes.overview: Rebecca's relationships are tested as she tries to navigate her friendship with Paula, her history with Josh and her connection with Greg. While at Josh's sister Jayma's wedding, Rebecca's world is turned upside down.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Neurotic lawyer Rebecca bumps into her high school boyfriend on the street and pursues him across the country on a misguided quest for true love.

episodes.name: Where is Josh's Friend?
episodes.overview: Rebecca is convinced Josh is in love with her, while Greg is nowhere to be found. Paula is coming to terms with what drove her obsession with Rebecca’s love life, while Darryl and White Josh try to navigate their new relationship.

episodes.name: When Will Josh See How Cool I am?
episodes.overview: Rebecca desperately wants Josh to think she’s cool so she tries to impress him with her sporty skills. Meanwhile, Greg is navigating his way through his new path, and is sorely tested by someone close to him.

episodes.name: All Signs Point to Josh… Or is it Josh’s Friend?
episodes.overview: Rebecca finds herself torn between two men. As the sign she is looking for is seemingly in front of her, she knows she’s meant to choose Josh – or is it Greg? Paula finds herself also struggling with a big decision.

episodes.name: When Will Josh and His Friend Leave Me Alone?
episodes.overview: Heather comes to Rebecca’s rescue after a major mishap and Rebecca attempts to reinvent herself. Paula is left to pick up the pieces at work and finds herself at a crossroads.

episodes.name: Why is Josh’s Ex-Girlfriend Eating Carbs?
episodes.overview: When Rebecca forces Valencia to attend a festival with her, she finds she has more in common with Valencia than just Josh. Paula finds a new friend in Sunil, while Darryl learns something surprising about White Josh and ultimately, himself.

episodes.name: Who Needs Josh When You Have a Girl Group?
episodes.overview: When Rebecca tries to host a girls’ night with Paula, Heather, and Valencia, things don’t go as planned. Meanwhile, Darryl bonds with co-worker Maya and discovers they have more in common than he realized.

episodes.name: Who’s the Cool Girl Josh is Dating?
episodes.overview: When Rebecca and Valencia decide to investigate the new girl Anna that Josh has been dating, they discover way more than they bargained for. Paula, being pulled in different directions, feels disconnected from her husband Scott.

episodes.name: Who Is Josh's Soup Fairy?
episodes.overview: Rebecca jumps at the chance to repair her relationship with Paula, which includes babysitting Tommy. Meanwhile, Josh has a revelation that forces him to re-evaluate things.

episodes.name: When Do I Get to Spend Time with Josh?
episodes.overview: When Darryl sells the law firm, the new boss Nathaniel threatens layoffs, which causes everyone to go into panic mode. Rebecca, determined to save everyone's jobs, goes to extreme measures to prove Nathaniel wrong.

episodes.name: Will Scarsdale Like Josh's Shayna Punim?
episodes.overview: When Rebecca attends a family Bar Mitzvah and sees her Rabbi, she realizes she still has far to go on her search for happiness.

episodes.name: Josh is the Man of My Dreams, Right?
episodes.overview: When the Santa Ana winds blow into town, they cause everyone in West Covina to act a little strangely and question their relationships and priorities. Rebecca and Nathaniel get to know each other better while Paula and Darryl confront an ongoing dilemma in their friendship.

episodes.name: Is Josh Free in Two Weeks?
episodes.overview: Rebecca realizes she must rely on her friends when she gets overwhelmed by a stressful situation.  Rebecca also discovers she has a lot in common with Nathaniel when his father comes to town.

episodes.name: Can Josh Take a Leap of Faith?
episodes.overview: Rebecca's father makes a surprise appearance, which gets Rebecca's hopes up for her future, while Josh takes a hard look at himself. White Josh and Darryl find themselves at an unexpected crossroads.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2, Rebecca embraces her newfound openness with Josh, but her honesty sends Paula and the whole gang in unexpected directions.

episodes.name: Josh's Ex-Girlfriend Wants Revenge
episodes.overview: Rebecca, abandoned at the altar by her obsession, Josh, works to plot her revenge  with the help of Paula, Heather and Valencia. It might be a bit tough to figure out, since he ran off the day of the wedding to become a priest.  Meanwhile, White Josh and Darryl have some problems to work on and Paula and Scott confront some unusual issues in their marriage.

episodes.name: To Josh, With Love.
episodes.overview: Rebecca, unsatisfied with Paula’s ideas to build a case against Josh, turns to Nathaniel for help crafting a truly evil plan. Meanwhile, Josh finds becoming a priest is harder than he thought.

episodes.name: Josh Is a Liar.
episodes.overview: After encountering a major setback in her plan to get even with Josh, a panicked Rebecca starts a smear campaign to discredit Josh before he can turn everyone against her.

episodes.name: Josh’s Ex-Girlfriend Is Crazy.
episodes.overview: Rebecca takes her quest for revenge to the next level as her friends unite to try and help her.

episodes.name: I Never Want to See Josh Again.
episodes.overview: Rebecca goes home to Westchester where she draws closer to her mother and tries to find a way forward. The friends and co-workers she left behind, including Paula and Nathaniel, struggle with their emotions regarding her departure.

episodes.name: Josh Is Irrelevant.
episodes.overview: Rebecca tries to come to grips with her new life and some new information about herself.

episodes.name: Getting Over Jeff.
episodes.overview: Rebecca continues her road to wellness while Paula comes to terms with her roots.

episodes.name: Nathaniel Needs My Help!
episodes.overview: Rebecca wonders if history is repeating itself as Darryl embraces a newfound superpower and Paula schemes again, this time for good.

episodes.name: Nathaniel Gets the Message!
episodes.overview: Rebecca discovers the powers and limitations of altruism as a new, unexpected bromance forms between two other characters.

episodes.name: Oh Nathaniel, It's On!
episodes.overview: Rebecca navigates major changes in her professional life and Heather gets a new opportunity.

episodes.name: Nathaniel and I Are Just Friends!
episodes.overview: Rebecca faces some fears in therapy while Paula brings a new friend to work.

episodes.name: Trent?!
episodes.overview: Just as Rebecca tries to be more realistic and practical, Trent returns to throw a wrench into her plans; Josh and Valencia reckon with their shared history.

episodes.name: Nathaniel Is Irrelevant.
episodes.overview: When Rebecca decides to make amends for her past, she finds some unexpected challenges. At the same time, West Covina awaits an important new arrival.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Rebecca regroups after her latest relationship drama, Josh finds a new calling, Paula and Scott work on their marriage, and Darryl gets baby fever.

episodes.name: I Want to Be Here
episodes.overview: Rebecca confronts the consequences of her guilty plea while an angry Nathaniel seeks solace in a retreat and Josh searches for answers.

episodes.name: I Am Ashamed
episodes.overview: Rebecca convinces Paula, Heather and Valencia to participate in a séance after making a spooky discovery. Darryl takes his parenting duties to an extreme, while Nathaniel is determined to prove to his father that he is the best person to run the law firm.

episodes.name: I'm On My Own Path
episodes.overview: As Rebecca contemplates her feelings about her career, Paula is forced to deal with a big client. Josh tries to get back in the dating game, while Heather and Hector deal with insurance.

episodes.name: I'm Making Up for Lost Time
episodes.overview: Rebecca re-unites under unusual circumstances with half-brother Tucker and discovers they have many things in common. In an effort to connect with her kids, Paula plans an activity that requires they all to work together. Meanwhile, Nathaniel brainstorms a way to win Rebecca back.

episodes.name: I'm So Happy for You
episodes.overview: Heather and Valencia both have changes in their lives which leaves Rebecca reeling. Meanwhile, Paula has to adjust to some good news/bad news from her eldest son.

episodes.name: I See You
episodes.overview: Rebecca gets more than she bargained for during a day out with Darryl. Josh lends a helping hand to Paula, while Heather encourages Nathaniel to be a nice person.

episodes.name: I Will Help You
episodes.overview: Rebecca takes a trip to visit her mother with intentions to tell Naomi about her new career path. Josh housesits for Rebecca and discovers being alone is harder than it seems, while Nathaniel helps one of Paula's clients in an effort to do something good.

episodes.name: I'm Not the Person I Used to Be
episodes.overview: Greg returns to West Covina, which forces Rebecca to question things she thought she knew about people she has loved in her life. Meanwhile, Valencia and Josh make some shocking discoveries while at their high school reunion.

episodes.name: I Need Some Balance
episodes.overview: Rebecca decides that she needs to find a way to take her mind off her ex-boyfriends.

episodes.name: I Can Work with You
episodes.overview: Rebecca agrees to help out Darryl by offering to babysit and an unexpected guest crashes the evening. Meanwhile, Paula throws a game night.

episodes.name: I'm Almost Over You
episodes.overview: Rebecca tries to stick to her plan for happiness while Nathaniel and Maya bond over their feelings of unrequited love.

episodes.name: I Need a Break
episodes.overview: When Rebecca and Greg take a day trip, things don’t go quite as planned. Meanwhile, Paula has an incredibly stressful week.

episodes.name: I Have to Get Out
episodes.overview: Rebecca supports Paula in her time of need despite her own personal challenges. Emotions run high when Greg, Josh and Nathaniel have an unfortunate encounter.

episodes.name: I'm Finding My Bliss
episodes.overview: Rebecca tries out for the local community theater, while Paula is courted by various law firms.

episodes.name: I Need to Find My Frenemy
episodes.overview: Rebecca gets a call to help her old nemesis out of a complicated situation; Nathaniel, Josh and Greg attempt to deal with their competing feelings for Rebecca.

episodes.name: I Have a Date Tonight
episodes.overview: Rebecca spends time with Nathaniel, Josh and Greg in an attempt to get clarity on her feelings.

episodes.name: I'm in Love
episodes.overview: Rebecca makes a life-changing decision about her future.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Following a string of very questionable decisions, Rebecca vows to take responsibility for her actions -- but goes a little overboard.
